author: BigLibSB
title: Imagine If the Bush Administration Bombed a Hospital in Afghanistan
text: Imagine If the Bush Administration Bombed a Hospital in Afghanistan User Name Current Events Current Events Forum - Latest political news and events Talent on loan from god Location: Ohio Posts: 17,838 It was our military that bombed that hospital. And yes, I would like to see some court martials. Location: Tejas. Posts: 28,668 Bill Clinton bombed the Chinese embassy in Belgrade. The CIA used the wrong coordinates. Clinton apologized, the Chinese didn't believe him, the world moved on. That is war.
